metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3978 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Text nodes not in the HTML namespace are incorrectly literally rendered, causing text which should be escaped to not be. This could lead to an XSS attack.

notes.Note: alexmurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-golang-x-net mdeslaur> containerd contains a vendored copy of golang-golang-x-net google-guest-agent does not contain the render.go file containerd does not contain the render.go file

criterions.comment: containerd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-golang-x-net-dev: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
google-guest-agent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
